莏字的基本解释

莏
suō
〔捼（
ru?）莏〕两手相摩。

莏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suō］
［《廣韻》蘇禾切，平戈，心。］
见“捼莏”。

莏字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莏； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第33
【唐韻】蘇禾切，同莎。【玉篇】手挼莏也。【詩·周南疏】《阮孝緒·字略》云：煩潤猶挼莏也。【黃庭堅詩】挼莏殘菊更傳杯。○按《集韻》又作宣爲切，音與莎異，而捼莏義同。攷挼、莏二字本疉韻，支、歌二韻俱互見，挼字在支韻，則莎音綏，在歌韻則當爲莎。又按莏卽挱字，應歸手部，然唐人已收艸部，今仍兩部互見。

莏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
莏字的起名意思

暂无。

Shi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suō］
["Guangyun" Su Heqie, Ping Ge, Heart. ]
See "Punch".
Shi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　莏; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1033 Page 33
[Tang Yun] Su Heqie, the same as Sha. [Jade articles] Move your hand and move it. 【Poetry·Zhou Nanshu】"Ruan Xiaoxu·Words Sketch" says: troubles are still moving. 【Huang Tingjian's poems】Norxun Residual Ju is even more popular. ○According to "Jiyun", it is also declared as cut, the sound is different from Sha, but the meaning is the same. The two characters "Kao Nuo" and "Xu" are in the original rhyme, and the two rhymes of "Zhi" and "Song" can be seen each other. Pressing the word 卽挱 again, it should belong to the hand part, but the Tang people have already accepted the part, and the two parts are still seeing each other today.
